Layered Navigation: If set, system remembers filters applied to each category so when customer navigates to a category to which he/she had applied filters earlier, those filtered are still applied.
Установить ползунки для атрибутов: If set, system remembers filters applied to each category so when customer navigates to a category to which he/she had applied filters earlier, those filtered are still applied.

Layered Navigation: Applied to all other attributes of price type
Not applicable to category and price filters
Установить ползунки для атрибутов: Не применять к фильтрам категорий и цены

Layered Navigation: If set, system remembers filters applied on search page so when customer uses search, those filtered are still applied.
Установить ползунки для атрибутов: If set, system remembers filters applied on search page so when customer uses search, those filtered are still applied.

Layered Navigation: If set, system remembers filters applied to each CMS page containing layered navigation, so when customer navigates to a CMS page to which he/she had applied filters earlier, those filtered are still applied.
Установить ползунки для атрибутов: If set, system remembers filters applied to each CMS page containing layered navigation, so when customer navigates to a CMS page to which he/she had applied filters earlier, those filtered are still applied.

Layered Navigation: One or more attribute codes separated by comma (','). If not empty, specified filters are remembered globally across different categories, CMS pages and search.
Установить ползунки для атрибутов: One or more attribute codes separated by comma (','). If not empty, specified filters are remembered globally across different categories, CMS pages and search.
